explanation: [0-0] A person's right hand is holding a green and a black ball against a white sink background. The person is wearing a silver ring on their index finger and has black graffiti on their palm.

[0-7] Then the hand releases the balls, letting them freefall into the sink. On the left side of the sink is written in black text "Your", on the right side in black text "Bestfriend", and in the middle "has to". In the bottom left corner is green text: "get Burger King tomorrow", and in the bottom right corner, it says in black text "get McDonalds tomorrow." Subsequently, the black ball falls in first, plugging the drain, and the green one stops beside it.
